Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Root/Normal
ShortDescription: Eastbound 43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via Emerald, Root, Wallace and 43rd : due to, street blockage near Root/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via Emerald, Root, Wallace and 43rd : due to, street blockage near Root/Normal.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute near 115th/Halsted
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses temp. rerouted  due to, street blockage near 115th/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 115th/Halsted, due to street blockage near 115th/Halsted.

Westbound buses will operate via 115th, Halsted, 119th, Ashland and 115th including the normal route streets.

Eastbound buses will operate via Marshfield, 119th, Halsted and 115th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute at Jackson/Central

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Harrison, Laramie and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Jackson/Central.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Addison
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Addison. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Addison due to stalled train

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
